text:
Hello all!
I have the following problem:

Using webpack I have split my application into different chunks.
With require_js I have included the main.js file.
The patch looks like this:

<http://cdn1.HubSpotusercontent-eu1.net/hub/12345679/hub_generated/template_assets/12345679/12345679/my_theme/js/ng-hub/main.min.js|cdn1.HubSpotusercontent-eu1.net/hub/12345679/hub_generated/template_assets/12345679/12345679/my_theme/js/ng-hub/main.min.js>.

The other chunks should be loaded by webpack using the import method. But then the path is wrong, so the brwoser gets a 404 error:
<http://12345679.hs-sites-eu1.com/895.js>

How can I achieve this lazy loading js chunk scenario?

Thanks for the help :slightly_smiling_face:
